Floral baskets laid before statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral baskets laid before statue of Kim Il Sung 
     Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The military attaches' corps here yesterday laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill and paid homage to him on the occasion of the New Year.
   That day, a floral basket was laid before the statue of the President by Pak Kwang Gi, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the National Democratic Front of South Korea (NDFSK), and its members.

articles.title: Congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il from NDFSK central committee
Kim Yong Nam meets diplomatic envoys
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam meets diplomatic envoys 
     Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, yesterday met and conversed with diplomatic envoys of various countries in Pyongyang, congratulating them on the occasion of the New Year Juche 89 (2000).
   Present were premier of the cabinet Hong Song Nam, vice-president of the presidium of the DPRK SPA Yang Hyong Sop, chairman of the SPA Choe Thae Bok and Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun.    
   Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, ambassador of the state of Palestine to the DPRK, who is the doyen of the diplomatic corps here, sincerely wished the great leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Il a long life in good health and the Korean people greater success in their struggle for socialist construction and national reunification in the New Year.

articles.title: Greetings to Algerian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greetings to Ahmed Benbitour on his appointment as Prime Minister of the Algerian Democratic and People's Republic.
   The message wished the Algerian Prime Minister success in his responsible work, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop in the future, too.

articles.title: Greetings to Algerian Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian Foreign Minister 
     Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Youssef Yousfi on his appointment as Foreign Minister of the Algerian Democratic and People's Republic.
   The message wished the Algerian Foreign Minister great success in his work, expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to  develop on good terms.
